  Breakout of a parent element's `max-width` to fill the entire viewport width.

---

# Breakout

Class-based implementation of our breakout mixin from
[sky-toolkit-core/tools/mixins](../../tools/_mixins.scss).


```html { "render": false }
<div class="u-breakout">
  ...
</div>
```
